channel.title: Posts on aaron's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on aaron's notes

item.title: Notes on ChatGPT Prompt Engineering Course
item.description: Andrew Ng’s new course (ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers - DeepLearning.AI) is a good start to learn about prompt engineering. The following are some notes on the course.

item.title: An Introduction to Caching in Python
item.description: Caching is a technique used to improve the performance of software applications by storing frequently accessed data in memory, rather than repeatedly retrieving it from slower sources like disk or network.

item.title: Demystifying Yield in Python
item.description: Python’s yield statement is a powerful tool that can be used in a variety of contexts, including generator functions, coroutines, and asynchronous programming.

item.title: 如何使用PM2部署Node.js应用
item.description: PM2是一个用于管理和保持Node.js应用状态的进程管理器。它可以用于部署和监控你的Node.js应用程序。本文将介绍如何使用PM2部署Node.js应用。

item.title: Docker启动Redis, Low Memory Warning处理方法
item.description: Redis是一种高性能的开源内存数据结构存储系统，可以用作数据库、缓存和消息代理。它支持很多数据结构，包括字符串、哈希、列表、集合、有序集合等。Redis在内存中存储数据，并且支持数据持久化，可以将数据存储在磁盘上，以便在重启时恢复数据。

item.title: What are Context Managers in Python
item.description: In Python, context managers are a powerful tool for managing resources such as files, sockets, and locks. While Python provides built-in context managers such as with open() as f: for working with files, you can also define your own context managers using the contextlib module. In this post, I’ll explore how to define your own context managers in Python.

item.title: Zsh, Oh My Zsh
item.description: Zsh（Z shell）是一个Unix shell，旨在成为流行的Bash shell的一个交互式和强大的替代品。它是一个开源的shell，可用于大多数基于Unix的操作系统，包括Linux和macOS，已成为macOS默认的shell。

item.title: 使用Docker配置启动Nginx
item.description: Nginx（发音为 “engine x”）是一个高性能的Web服务器和反向代理服务器，也可以作为一个负载平衡器、HTTP缓存和邮件代理服务器。它被设计用来处理大量的并发连接，而内存使用量却很低，这使得它成为高流量网站的热门选择。

item.title: 使用Docker Compose快速部署ElasticSearch
item.description: 有时需要在Windows上部署ElasticSearch，那么最方便的方法还是用docker-compose来安装部署。也可以将本文作为快速上手docker-compose的简单案例。

item.title: Beautiful riverside park in Canada
item.description: The Detroit River, the Ambassador Bridge, the Windsor Sculpture Park and the Canada geese.

item.title: Github Pages Hugo博客主题更新踩坑小记
item.description: 好久没用Github，这个博客也很长时间没有更新了，几乎已经被遗忘了。之前喜欢在工作之余利用Github来记一些笔记

item.title: How To Change The Theme of A Hugo Blog
item.description: A few days ago I migrated this blog to Hugo from Jekyll and employed a beautiful theme called Even, a concise and powerful hugo theme, which fascinated me so much until I came across another graceful and exquisite hugo theme called Tranquilpeak

item.title: How To Setup a Blog with Hugo and Github Pages on Mac
item.description: GitHub is not only a cool community for developers who can create teams, share code, and even make friends, but it also provides free tools for people who like to toss around ideas.

item.title: 机器学习中的偏差(Bias)与方差(Variance)
item.description: 一个机器学习方法的泛化性能与它对独立测试数据的预测能力有关。对泛化性能的评估在机器学习实践中极为重要

item.title: 基于预训练词向量模型的文本分类方法
item.description: 本文语料仍然是上篇所用的搜狗新闻语料，采用中文预训练词向量模型对词进行向量表示。

item.title: 基于搜狗新闻语料的文本分类
item.description: 文本分类（Text Classification）是自然语言处理中的一个重要应用技术，根据文档的内容或主题，自动识别文档所属的预先定义的类别标签。

item.title: Git快速指南
item.description: 很多公司内部使用GitLab来做版本管理，假设你已经按照公司wiki设置好了Git账户。那么如何快速开始使用Git进行代码版本管理，下面是一些常用流程步骤。

item.title: How to Install and Configure Elasticsearch Clusters
item.description: Elasticsearch is a highly scalable open-source full-text search and analytics engine based on Lucene. This post focus on how to setup an Elasticsearch cluster.

item.title: How To Create Virtual Environments by venv
item.description: When I tested examples of the book Deep learning from scratch, a RuntimeError prompted told me matplotlib backend was not able to function correctly as my Python is not installed as a framework.

item.title: How To Properly Install Python3 and Virtualenv on Mac
item.description: When I got a Macbook Pro, the first thing I thought was how to deploy a developing environment for programming and data analysis on Mac OS.
